/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. Tall buildings stretch towards the sky, their towering presence a testament to the city's urban development. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
